metadata.name: Michael Anderson

persona.name: Jamal Carter
persona.role: Existing customer, accounting contact for a manufacturing office
persona.goal: Resolve a billing discrepancy and find the right billing support channel
persona.context: Invoice amount changed unexpectedly; needs clarification and potential adjustment; not looking for new services

intent.name: Renewal / Contract Review Callback
intent.description: An existing customer wants to renew or review their plan, which should be routed to a scheduled sales callback.
intent.goal: Confirm renewal intent, capture details, and schedule a callback appointment.
intent.initialMessage: Our contract is up soon—can someone call me to go over renewal options?

emotion.name: Excited
emotion.description: Upbeat language, quick replies, eager to schedule; uses positive framing like “ready to get this set up” or “can’t wait to switch.”

metadata.outcome: Billing support channel confirmed and renewal callback time provided.

turns.content: Our contract is up soon—can someone call me to go over renewal options and also a billing discrepancy on our last invoice?

I understand you need to discuss renewal and a billing issue.  
For the billing discrepancy, please visit https://business.comcast.com/support/home/.  
May I have your name to schedule a call about the renewal?

messages:
I understand you need to discuss renewal and a billing issue.  
For the billing discrepancy, please visit https://business.comcast.com/support/home/.  
May I have your name to schedule a call about the renewal?

turns.content:
Sure thing, I’m Jamal Carter, accounting contact for our manufacturing office.  

Before we lock in a time, can you tell me if that support link is the right place specifically for invoice amount disputes, or is there a dedicated billing phone line or form I should use so I can upload the invoice and notes?

The support link lets you upload the invoice and work with a billing specialist for disputes.  
When would you like a call to discuss renewal options—please share a preferred date, time, and your timezone?

messages:
The support link lets you upload the invoice and work with a billing specialist for disputes.  
When would you like a call to discuss renewal options—please share a preferred date, time, and your timezone?

turns.content:
Perfect, that’s exactly what I needed on the billing side—I'll use that link to upload the invoice and details.  

For the renewal call, tomorrow at 2:00 PM Eastern works great for me.
